about_the_game:
Certainly! Here's the English version:



At the end of time, an ancient, familiar evil awakens, threatening the remaining life in the universe.

Join Ember on a journey in this fantasy adventure, where exploration, combat, and puzzles await you. Traverse beautifully crafted landscapes, from enchanted forests to ancient ruins, as you battle the forces of darkness and restore balance to a world on the brink of destruction.

Features
Exciting Combat: Fight alongside Ember and take on intricate bosses and monsters.


Puzzles: Solve a variety of puzzles that challenge your logical thinking and creativity. Each puzzle is carefully designed to seamlessly blend with the environment and story, unlocking new areas and secrets as you progress through the story. Discover the history of a civilization on the edge of collapse.


Engaging Story: Uncover the secrets of a forgotten past and confront the darkness that threatens the world. Experience a rich narrative that unfolds through dialogues and environmental storytelling.

Handcrafted Art: Enjoy a hand-pixeled experience with original environments, character designs, and animations that bring the world of Ember to life.

About Us
We are a passionate two-person indie studio, dedicated to creating captivating and meaningful gaming experiences. Every aspect of this game, from the art to the gameplay, has been lovingly crafted to provide you with an unforgettable adventure. We’re thrilled that you’ve discovered our game and hope it brings you as much joy as we had in developing it.
